resources.string: You can get coins by watching videos or subscribing to Youtube Channels .
You can boost your youtube channel videos . Just you need to start a campaign . You must have to provide correct URl. Follow the Url example.
You can boost your youtube channels Subscriber . Just you need to start a campaign . You must have to provide correct URl. Follow the Url example.

We need the permission for Subscription and Like method . The app is under google api so we can\'t manage your channel or do anything personally . Hence if you have any doubt you can use any gmail account that have youtube channel to use the app .
